title: Variety Chain Store Sales, Adjusted for Trend, Price, and Seasonal Changes for United States
notes:
Coverage Includes Variety, Ten-Cent, And Drug Chains. Data Represent The Daily Average Basis. Source: Federal Reserve Bank Of New York, Domestic Research Department

This NBER data series m06009 appears on the NBER website in Chapter 6 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter06.html.

NBER Indicator: m06009
